analysis.Summary: This Vue component renders a list of organizations filtered by role (Owner, Member, Follower), provides a tabbed interface to switch between roles, and includes a button to navigate to the Create Organization page.
analysis.Purpose: Acts as the main Organizations page in the application, fetching and displaying organization data via a Feed component and providing navigation controls.

Components.name: Tab
Components.description: Renders tabs for selecting the userâ€™s role (owner, member, follower).

Components.name: Feed
Components.description: Fetches and renders a list of organizations using a scoped slot for item rendering and load-more control.

Components.name: CardOrganization
Components.description: Displays individual organization details (name, rating, followers) inside the Feed slot.

Components.name: Card
Components.description: Base card UI component (imported for potential reuse, not directly used here).

Functions.name: initializeTab
Functions.description: Sets the initial tab value from the route query or defaults to 'owner'

Functions.name: navigateToCreateOrganization
Functions.description: Inline click handler to push the 'Create Organization' route when the '+' button is clicked

Functions.name: watchTabChange
Functions.description: Watches the tabOrganization ref and updates the router query parameter on change

Functions.name: organizations.actions.read
Functions.description: Store action passed to Feed for reading organizations from the backend

analysis.Usage: Typically registered in the Vue Router as the component for the '/organizations' route. Other parts of the app navigate to it via $router.push or link components.
analysis.Notes: There is no dedicated <style> block; styling relies on utility classes. Uses v-memo for list rendering optimization. Conditionally hides the header on a global MOBILE_APP flag. Route query 'tab' stays in sync with the selected tab via a watcher.
